data.strFullDescription:
[h2]About the demo version[/h2]

Hello! We're the development team of [Five Hearts Under One Roof].

We've released a Free Demo version for you try out!

*Please not that some features and contents are locked in the demo version. These will only be available in the full version of the game.
[list][*] In the Free Demo, you will be able to play [u]Chapter 1[/u] of the game, which consists of 6 main chapters and 5 endings.[/list]
[list][*] Disable [u]voting in the ranking system[/u], which allows for rank battles with other users. [/list]
[list][*] [u] Chapter progress rewards for Chapter 1 are not available[/u].  [/list]

We hope you'll continue to enjoy the full version as well! We'd really appreciate your support and spread the news to the world!

[H2]Plot/Characters[/H2]

[Five Hearts Under One Roof] is a fully immersive interactive video game that simulates a love story with five unique heroines. As the player, you take on the role of Yuman, who has always been home alone. Now, you’ll be running a lively, [b]love-filled boarding house with five fascinating heroines.[/b]

Who will be by your side in the end?

[b]The First Resident: Your Childhood Friend of 20 Years - Mal-sook Go[/b]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3166530/extras/0827_고말숙2.gif?t=1729835172[/img]
[i]“Are you really just going to be friends with me?”[/i]

[b]The Second Resident: Your First Love and Former Idol - Min-jung Park[/b]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3166530/extras/0827_박민정.gif?t=1729835172[/img]
[i]“I don’t want to be just a singer and fan with you.”[/i]

[b]The Third Resident: Your Demanding Boss - Gran Dong[/b]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3166530/extras/0827_동그란.gif?t=1729835172[/img]
[i]“Cute, Yuman, you like things like this?”[/i]

[b]The Fourth Resident: The Bold and Forward Younger Girl - Eun-bi Go[/b]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3166530/extras/0827_고은비3.gif?t=1729835172[/img]
[i]“I’ve come to marry you!”[/i]

[b]The ??th Resident: The Adorable Recluse - Seung-yi Jo[/b]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3166530/extras/0827_조승이.gif?t=1729835172[/img]
[i]“I’ve been saved.”[/i]

Which of these five unique and captivating heroines will steal your heart?
Or… could it be that [i]your true love lies with someone unexpected?[/i]
data.strSnippet: Yuman’s, the player, once solitary home and routine are now invaded by five beautiful women! Each has her unique charm – the 'childhood friend of 20 years,' the 'first love and former idol,' the 'demanding boss,' the 'bold younger girl,' and the 'shy recluse.' Who will you choose?
